name: Personality Destroyer
description:
This game was made with Unity for the 5th Klagenfurt Game Jam in April 2018.

This game was a collab by:

  • Alexander Armbruckner
  • Alexander Hoen
  • Lioba Pleschberger
  • Natalie Roos
  • Ricarda Kleine
  • Sarah Wachter
  • Wilfried Elmenreich

Additional help (graphics): Christina Obmann and Felix Schniz

Assets and game source are released under CC-BY 3.0 license.

Download the sourcecode of this game at github
